CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1957, pg. 23 reads: " "Reaching For It" - Mrs. Howard Hairston strikes a pose as she reaches for a luscious piece of barbecue at the Sunday fete given by Mary and Bob McEnheimer at their home. A number of out-of-towners were in attendance at the affair which drew close to 100 guests. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of men and women, including Mrs. Howard Hairston wearing light colored capri pants with dark belt, and Toki Schalk Johnson, gathered for barbecue on porch of home of Bob and Mary McEnheimer, Lincoln Avenue
